headline: Argus Raised Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG)’s Price Target
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is among the 11 Best Green Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. John Eade, an Argus analyst, maintained his Buy rating on Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) and increased his price target from $350 to $375 on August 12. The change comes after the business’s Q2 adjusted results, which showed a […]
